amendment.description: Amendment requires the Director of the Office of National Drug Control Policy to study the specific impact on citizens of the United States of violence related to drug-trafficking along the international border between the United States and Mexico.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 109-387 to direct the ONDCP to conduct a study of the incidences of kidnapped, killed, and missing Americans along the U.S.-Mexico border and report to Congress on how to prevent such crimes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cuellar amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
